name: CPPGI (C++ CGI Library)
short_description: CPPGI is a C++ library for writing CGI scripts. It is written in ISO C++ with excessive use of templates. There are a few platform dependend functions, but they are all wrapped nicely. CPPGI compiles on many compilers.
